answer: The increase in mandatory funding for VA benefit programs from FY2024 to FY2025 is $33 billion. This includes $24 billion for the Toxic Exposures Fund, $210.6 billion for traditional benefits (Compensation and Pensions, Readjustment Benefits, Housing and Insurance), and $20.3 billion for construction and cost of war in FY2024. The total mandatory funding requested for FY2025 was $369.3 billion, an increase of $33 billion over FY2024 ($336.1 billion).
